verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to cancel Kim Jong - un ’s upcoming summit with President Trump if the U.S. does n’t back off on denuclearization] .
[ARG0: North Korea] threatened to [V: cancel] [ARG1: Kim Jong - un ’s upcoming summit with President Trump] [ARGM-ADV: if the U.S. does n’t back off on denuclearization] .
North Korea threatened to cancel Kim Jong - un ’s upcoming summit with President Trump if the U.S. [V: does] n’t back off on denuclearization .
North Korea threatened to cancel Kim Jong - un ’s upcoming summit with President Trump if [ARG0: the U.S.] does [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: back] off [ARG1: on denuclearization] .
